State#

class pynext.State(http)[source]#

Bases: object

State is the provider between the HTTP client. It creates objects through data received from the HTTP response.

Parameters:

http (HTTPClient) – HTTPClient to send requests, that are needed to create some objects.

http#

Global HTTPClient object.

Type:

HTTPClient

logger#

State logger.

Type:

logging.Logger

async chunk_guild_channels(user, guild, data)[source]#

Method to chunk guild channels.

Parameters:

  • user (SelfBot) – Selfbot, which will make requests needed to chunk channels.

  • guild (Guild) – Guild to which the chucked channels belong.

  • data (list[dict[str, Any]]) – Required data to create a channels.

Return type:

None

create_dm_channel(data)[source]#

Method to create a dm channel object from a data.

Parameters:

data (dict[str, Any]) – Required data to create a channel object.

Return type:

DMChannel

async create_guild(user, guild_data, chunk_channels=True)[source]#

Method to create a guild object from data.

Parameters:

  • user (SelfBot) – Selfbot, which will make requests needed to create guild.

  • guild_data (dict[str, Any]) – Required data to create a guild object.

  • chunk_channels (bool) – Whether to chunk channels after guild build.

Return type:

Guild

create_guild_channel(guild, data)[source]#

Method to create a guild channel object from a data.

Parameters:

  • guild (Guild) – Guild to which the created channel should belong.

  • data (dict[str, Any]) – Required data to create a channel object.

Return type:

Union[GuildChannel, TextChannel, VoiceChannel, CategoryChannel]

create_guild_member(guild, data)[source]#

Method to create a guild member object from a data.

Parameters:

  • guild (Guild) – Guild to which the created member should belong.

  • data (dict[str, Any]) – Required data to create a member object.

Return type:

GuildMember

create_guild_message(data)[source]#

Method to create a guild message object from a data.

Parameters:

data (dict[str, Any]) – Required data to create a message object.

Return type:

GuildMessage

async create_message_from_data(user, data)[source]#

Method to create a message object from data.

Parameters:

  • user (SelfBot) – Selfbot, which will make requests needed to create message.

  • data (dict[str, Any]) – Required data to create a message object.

Return type:

UnionType[PrivateMessage, GuildMessage, None]

static create_overwrites(user, guild, overwrites_data)[source]#

Method that creates overwrites from data.

Parameters:

  • user (SelfBot) – Selfbot that will make requests to fetch a role or guild member.

  • guild (Guild) – Guild to which PermissionOverwrite belongs.

  • overwrites_data (list[dict[str, Any]]) – list with overwrite data.

Return type:

AsyncIterable[tuple[PermissionOverwrite, Role | GuildMember]]

create_private_message(data)[source]#

Method to create a private message object from a data.

Parameters:

data (dict[str, Any]) – Required data to create a message object.

Return type:

PrivateMessage

create_user(data)[source]#

Method to create a discord user object from a data.

Parameters:

data (dict[str, Any]) – Required data to create a user object.

Return type:

DiscordUser

async fetch_channel_parent(channel, user)[source]#

Method which fetches the channel parent.

Parameters:

  • channel (Union[GuildChannel, TextChannel, VoiceChannel, CategoryChannel]) – Channel to fetch parent.

  • user (SelfBot) – Selfbot that will make requests to category channel.

Return type:

Optional[CategoryChannel]

async static fetch_guild_owner(guild, user)[source]#

Method to fetch guild owner.

Parameters:

  • guild (Guild) – Guild of the owner we want to fetch.

  • user (SelfBot) – Selfbot, which will make requests to fetch owner.

Return type:

None

async static fetch_message_from_raw(user, guild_id, channel_id, message_id)[source]#

Method that fetches a message without Guild and Channel objects.

Parameters:

  • user (SelfBot) – Selfbot that will make requests.

  • guild_id (Optional[int]) – The id of the guild to which the message was sent. If it is None, it means that the message is on the DM channel.

  • channel_id (int) – Id of the channel on which the message is sended.

  • message_id (int) – Specify message id.

Return type:

Union[PrivateMessage, GuildMessage, None]

guild_channel_factory(channel)[source]#

Method that converts a GuldChannel object to a specific channel type object. .. warning:

Method can return GuildChannel once again if we do not yet support the specified channel type.
Parameters:

channel (GuildChannel) – Base GuildChannel object.

Return type:

Union[GuildChannel, TextChannel, VoiceChannel, CategoryChannel]

static to_overwrite_payload(overwrites)[source]#

Method to convert overwrites to list with overwrite payload.

Parameters:

overwrites (dict[GuildMember | Role, PermissionOverwrite]) – Overwrites to convert.

Return type:

list[OverwritePayload]
